title: MacOS Sierra
body: Ever since I've updated to the newest MacOS (big mistake) I've experienced FPS drops to 5-30 from a steady 60. My razer mouse always moves back and forth by itself in game which I managed to semi-fix by turning off the "Use software mouse" option. Will League patch up to be compatible with Sierra?

replies.body:
Since macOS Sierra has only recently released in the final build, there are bound to be some issues here and there. We're certainly taking a look at things that can be resolved with input from the community and bug reports.

Let me know if you have any questions.
